column4: Hi, i tried getting my XP machine to connect to the internet via the Ubuntu Machine i am using- read this piece about ipmasq and dnsmasq on ubuntu forums...didnt do any good.
I wasnt even able to connect to the internet afterwards i attempted that guide- so can someone please give a hint what I should be reading next?
try firestater, it's an iptables wizard. do a "sudo apt-get install firestarter"
ok- anyone here tried sharing an internet connection with an XP machine on LAN before?
